Module com.example.poo
Package com.example.poo.weapons_bullets

Class HomingWeapon

java.lang.Object
com.example.poo.weapons_bullets.Weapon
com.example.poo.weapons_bullets.HomingWeapon
Direct Known Subclasses:
AimWeapon
public class HomingWeapon extends Weapon
The HomingWeapon class is a subclass of the abstract superclass Weapon It represents a Weapon shooting a HomingBullet It will create a HomingBullet when called from a SpaceEntity object

  • Method Details

    • getTarget

      protected SpaceEntity getTarget()
      A method to get the object each individual bullet will follow. Based on the entity that shoots it will either be the Player or the nearest enemy from the player
      Returns:
      The SpaceEntity that the next bullet will try to reach

    • shoot

      public void shoot()
      Overrides the shoot method from the superclass to handle the shooting behavior Shoot an only HomingBullet in front of the entity
      Specified by:
      shoot in class Weapon
